lexUnit.name: try.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: subject (someone) to trial, or investigate and decide (a case or issue) in a formal trial.

sentence.text: LONDON ( AP ) --- A Polish-born man in his 80s will be tried early next year for mass murders during World War II in Britain 's first war crimes trial , The Independent newspaper reported Monday .
